overview: Jacobo Muños is a convict who, after an encounter with God, has regained his liberty. Now, he returns to home trying to put his life back together and help his family; however he soon discovers that this is not an easy job. Discriminated against by society and stigmatized by his own church for his delicate past, Jacobo will face an innumerable amount of difficulties and bit by bit his new beliefs will be put to the test.Everything becomes more complicated when Tony Cortés, an old partner in crime, shows up with an offer which could solve all his problems. Will Jacobo succumb to the tension, or will he stand strong in his faith? (Translated from Spanish)
title: Tal Vez Mañana
